issue.title: [JS] Add more complete set of predicates
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-2236](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2236). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Right now `arrow.predicate` only supports ==, >=, <=, &&, and ||
We should also support !=, <, > at the very least

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2236?focusedCommentId=16393010) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
Issue resolved by pull request 1683
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/1683>
